text.div:
SecurityPolicy

Types of security policies that further specify the ActClassPolicy value set. Examples:
encrypt prohibit redisclosure without consent directive

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include codes from http://hl7.org/fhir/v3/ActCode where concept is-a SecurityPolicy

name: SecurityPolicy
description: Types of security policies that further specify the ActClassPolicy value set.  Examples:   encrypt prohibit redisclosure without consent directive
